settings: manual control and various automatic settings (video modeburst shooting, etc.)

color: white, blue, purple, red, black, silver, or pink
effects: 20 creative mode settings (soft focus, lighter or darker skin tones, miniature, etc.)
sensor_size: 23.5mm x 15.6mm [APS-C] X-Trans CMOS III with primary color filter

long_exposure: up to 60 seconds with Long Shutter Mode
